\usepackage[a4paper,bindingoffset=0.2in,left=1in,right=1in,top=1.5in,bottom=1.5in,footskip=.25in]{geometry}
\usepackage{etoolbox}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\usepackage[linktocpage=true,hidelinks]{hyperref}
\usepackage{enumitem} % http://ctan.org/pkg/enumitem

\setenumerate[1]{label={(\arabic*)}} % Global setting 

\makeatletter
\if@twoside
   \patchcmd{\ps@headings}%
      {\@evenhead{\thepage\hfil\slshape\leftmark}}%
      {\@evenhead{\thepage\hfil}}{}{}
\fi
   \patchcmd{\ps@headings}%
      {\@oddhead{{\slshape\rightmark}\hfil\thepage}}%
      {\@oddhead{\hfil\thepage}}{}{}  
\makeatother
\pagestyle{headings}

\newcommand{\Preface}{\chapter*{Preface}}
\renewcommand{\DEF}[2]{\index{#1}\emph{#2}}

% making index
\makeindex
